title: Wikimedia
description: The Wikimedia movement is a global community of people, projects, and activities working together to create and share knowledge freely.
text_excerpt: Wikimedia Welcome! The Wikimedia movement is a global community of people, projects, and activities working together to create and share knowledge freely. Join us in making all knowledge available to everyone, everywhere. Our Projects Our projects are the core of the Wikimedia movement . All major projects are operated
